ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: Sun proposes to apply Web service standardization principles to REST
ygData.msgSnippet: ... o Why not just have an interface with the well known verbs on? I know Java5 makes annotations possible, but it is not clear they are always appropriate.
